channel.title: I Need Help With A Few Things
channel.description:
Hey guys I'm new to the forums I'm not a very good coder but I know stuff..
I'm not 100% sure what source it is i think it is Czar :confused: Oldkoscape it is called.
What I need help with:
1.When I do vengeance, then go to eat I get "Hmm you should paint the trees...." My vengeance is on the (G) tab on ancients. I need to be a member to do it.
2.When someone dies by player or NPC, it logs them out and they can not log back in again until i restart the server (some times)
3. I would like to know how to get Skull's above peoples heads when they attack another player
Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks, jay [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2008, 12:57:27 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: I Need Help With A Few Things
item.dc:creator: @0o_jay_o01 0o_jay_o0
item.description:
@0o_jay_o01 wrote:

Hey guys I’m new to the forums
I’m not a very good coder but I know stuff…

I’m not 100% sure what source it is i think it is Czar Oldkoscape it is called.

What I need help with:

1.When I do vengeance, then go to eat I get “Hmm you should paint the trees…”
My vengeance is on the (G) tab on ancients. I need to be a member to do it.

2.When someone dies by player or NPC, it logs them out and they can not log back in again until i restart the server (some times)

  1. I would like to know how to get Skull’s above peoples heads when they attack another player

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks, jay [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2008, 12:57:27 pm[/size][hr]anyone?
